myClinicsSubtitle: manage the assignment to your clinics, edit your working hours or change the appointment fee
workingHoursSubtitle: select clinic opening hours (changes will be visible to all registered users)
addClinicSubtitle: add a new clinic so that you can then assign it as your workplace
addClinicAffiliationSubtitle: assign the clinic as your place of work, select the duration of the visit, the fee for the visit and add your working hours
editClinicAffiliationTitle: edit assignment of clinic as workplace
editClinicAffiliationSubtitle: assign the clinic as your place of work, select the duration of the visit, the fee for the visit and add your working hours
